text.section: On receipt of a properly assigned certificate of title, an application for a new certificate of title, the required fee, and any other documents and information required by law, the Administration shall issue a new certificate of title in the name of the transferee as owner and mail it to him.

The Administration shall:
File each surrendered certificate of title; and
Maintain the file to permit the tracing of title of any vehicle designated in it.
